title: The Salad Corner - Amoy Street Food Centre
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Takeaway salad bar chain restaurant in the CBD area offering create-your-own salads. Choose from toppings which include broccoli, beetroot, mushroom, beans, nuts, seeds, and more. Pre-order is available from 8-10:30am.
streetAddress: Amoy Street Food Centre, 01-41, 7 Maxwell Rd
